description: Deletes a CloudWatch log stream from an application. For more information about using CloudWatch log streams with Amazon Kinesis Analytics applications, see Working with Amazon CloudWatch Logs.

parameters.name: CurrentApplicationVersionId
parameters.description: The version ID of the Kinesis Analytics application.

parameters.name: CloudWatchLoggingOptionId
parameters.description: The CloudWatchLoggingOptionId of the CloudWatch logging option to delete. You can get the CloudWatchLoggingOptionId by using the DescribeApplication operation.
